insert into cm_customer_info (CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, BUSINESS_TYPE, BUSINESS_PRICE, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_PHONE, RECEIVER, RECEIVING_CONTACT, CONTACT_PHONE, RECEIPT_LOCATION, BILL_BOARD_LOCATION, LOADING_LOCATION, DISCHARGE_LOCATION, COUNTER_LOCATION, REMARK, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, OBJECT_VERSION_NUM) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivingContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billBoardLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loadingLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dischargeLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{counterLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 1)

mapper.update:
update cm_customer_info
CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_PRICE = #{businessPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MANAGER_NAME = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_PHONE = #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVER = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVING_CONTACT = #{receivingContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIPT_LOCATION = #{receiptLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_BOARD_LOCATION = #{billBoardLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOADING_LOCATION = #{loadingLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCHARGE_LOCATION = #{dischargeLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTER_LOCATION = #{counterLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = REPLACE(#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '\n', CHAR(13)),
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, OBJECT_VERSION_NUM = OBJECT_VERSION_NUM + 1
where CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update cm_customer_info set CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_PRICE = #{businessPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MANAGER_NAME = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_PHONE = #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVER = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVING_CONTACT = #{receivingContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIPT_LOCATION = #{receiptLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_BOARD_LOCATION = #{billBoardLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOADING_LOCATION = #{loadingLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCHARGE_LOCATION = #{dischargeLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTER_LOCATION = #{counterLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = REPLACE(#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '\n', CHAR(13)), LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, OBJECT_VERSION_NUM = OBJECT_VERSION_NUM + 1 where CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
